data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during Santa Gertrudis cruise from Cádiz to Cádiz started at 1779-07-30
Ship: Santa Gertrudis (Fragata), Voyage: Cádiz - Cádiz, 1st Observer: Aníbal Casoni (Capitan)
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
